snippet.title: Resident Evil 3 - DARK INFECTION [ PUBLIC Playstation Mod ]
snippet.description:
It's been almost 3 months since my last mod, and almost a year since my last public mod of Resident Evil 3.But the wait has been worth it, I present my latest public mod:
Resident Evil 3 - Dark Infection

and these are just some features that you can enjoy on this mod, most of them exclusive from psx and that no one has never  reach to do before on this plataform ( and some features i don't even seen on pc ) 

CHANGES / MODIFICATIONS 

+ Randomized weapons and ammo
+ Randomized enemies 
+ New routes
+ Hidden rooms
+ More 3D interactive objects 
+ More enemies 
+ Less red herbs 
+ New documents
+ New weapon types
+ New weapon models 
+ New damage effects in some weapons
+ New combinations 
+ New enemies skins
+ New nemesis drops 
+ New passwords 
+ New item effects 
+ New 3D models 
+ 5 New costumes
+ New messages in some rooms
+ Runner Zombies in some rooms
+ Timers in some rooms
+ Enemies in rooms where there wasn't before
+ Respawning certain enemies 
+ Respawning certain explosive barrels
+ New inventory screen 
+ Some fragments of the RE3 beta intro
=================================
Extra credits : 
I created the whole mod, but this fellows has helped me 
and his efforts has to be recognized 

- Main costume : Created by Andrew Coyte / Enrico 
Ported to RE3 by El rincon de Lobezno and reskin by Biohazard España

- Extra costume black - Andrew Coyte/Enrico
- Ncf1975 - Officer Jill costume
- Komizo lab -  Handgun model and fast knife

El rincon del lobezno : 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-qPk1ZvyVl8YfNzR-GR5Dw

Andrew Coyte/Enrico
https://www.youtube.com/user/AndrewCoyte


Ncf1975 : 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwP3WhcJ9n0Gy9H3S-113CQ

Komizo_lab : 
https://www.moddb.com/members/komizo-lab/mods
=================================
- Special thanks to Khaled and all the fellows from REDiscord for some tips on translations
- Thanks everyone for watching ! 
=================================
IMPORTANT : This modification only works on CFW systems for now like:
CFW PS3   
EPSXE ON PC 
AND DUCKSTATION IF YOU USE ANDROID - DON'T PLAY THIS MOD WITH THE WINDOWS VERSION OF DUCKSTATION, ALWAYS USE EPSXE

PSVita/PSP/ Real ps1-ps2 can't handle a burned CD for the moment.
i will upload a fix on the next weeks to correct that issue 
so everyone can play this mod on every single system capable to run PSX games 

DOWNLOAD LINK  v0.3 : https://pastebin.com/Uy2gbVH9
If you have downloaded the version v0.1 you have to download this new one , because i applied a fix on the RPD, now it's the v0.3 version. 
=================================
Since youtube has been working terrible this last months, i would like to ask all of you that ( if you can ) contribute with a like and sharing the video,until the channel begins to regain his original audience . I will apreciate your collab ^ _ ^ 

If you like my mods, you have  2 playlists down below. One of them it's all my work on PSX mods. The other one, it's called PUBLIC releases, and there  you can download and enjoy the best Resident evil mods created for psx .

=================================
✮🎮 More PSX Mods ( Resident Evil ) 🎮

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqV_cSVkNSt1I2jVHK24IfpeUbm9CnAIu

====================================
🎮[PUBLIC Releases]🎮

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqV_cSVkNSt0f1wEspOR8ewvls5-_8hee
====================================
 ✮ 📲📱My social media 📲📱
====================================
🔔Remember to activate all the notifications making tap on the Bell, next to the buttom " subscribe " 

this option is activated by subscribing to the channel the bell will appear next to  the bottom of "subscribe" 🔔

✮🎥 Twitch : https://go.twitch.tv/biohazardesp

✮ 🔁 Twitter : @BiohazardEsp

=================================================
#Disclaimer : For all the new subs or people that doesn't know the function of this chanel. I create mods by my self and with the only purpose of see how far can i go on Console modding like PS1, PS2,PS3, Gamecube or PC , those mods are private and from time to time i release some public mods, that you can find here on the description , meanwhile if you don't see any download link means it is private for the moment and time. 
#ResidentEvil3
#ResidentEvilPlaystationMOD
#ResidentEvilPSXMod
#ResidentEvilMods
#バイオハザード3
#re3enemiemod
#re3hardcoremod
